room_title: Escape room "Le Feu" by The Escapery in Atlanta
room_address: 1349 Old 41 Hwy NW, Suite 250 Marietta, GA 30060
room_description:
Just as the overture swells, filling the world-renowned Le Feu à Paris, you hear several crashes… and then an explosion! The theatre is on fire! 

Luckily, Le Feu’s claustrophobic founder is rumored to have ordered the construction of a secret passage exit, but no one has been able to find it yet. Can you escape before the flames engulf the auditorium and crack a sinister case of arson?
